Package net.edudb.operator

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Operator
    An interface that is used to add additional information to the relational algebra operators.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CartesianProductOperator
    A relational algebra operator, with two children, which is used to compute the Cartesian product of two relations.
    CreateTableOperator
    An operator, with no children, that is used to create a table in a database.
    DeleteOperator
    An operator, with one child, that is used to delete tuples from its child relation based on an optional condition.
    EquiJoinOperator
    A relational algebra operator, with two children, that joins two relations on columns that have equal values.
    FilterOperator
    A relational algebra operator, with one child, that filters tuples from a relation based on some condition.
    InsertOperator
    An operator, with one child, that inserts data to its child relation.
    ProjectOperator
    A relational algebra operator, with one child, that projects certain columns from a relation.
    RelationOperator
    Operator that relates to a relation.
    UpdateTableOperator
    An operator, with one child, that updates tuples in its child relation based on an optional condition.
